content.en: Nonlinear state estimation: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the accuracy and performance of state estimation in nonlinear dynamic systems. These algorithms integrate techniques such as Gaussian process regression, Empirical Mode Decomposition, and square root techniques into the existing cubature Kalman filter framework. By combining these methods, the algorithms are able to handle unknown or inaccurate state-space models, improve nonlinear filtering problems, solve passive location problems, and address other challenges in state estimation.
content.da: Ikke-lineær tilstandsestimering: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden og ydeevnen af tilstandsestimering i ikke-lineære dynamiske systemer. Disse algoritmer integrerer teknikker som Gaussisk procesregression, empirisk mode-dekomponering og kvadratrodsteknikker i den eksisterende kubatur-Kalman-filterramme. Ved at kombinere disse metoder er algoritmerne i stand til at håndtere ukendte eller unøjagtige tilstandsrum-modeller, forbedre ikke-lineære filtreringsproblemer, løse passive placeringsproblemer og tackle andre udfordringer inden for tilstandsestimering.
